actions.text: Amendment SA 3814, under the order of 4/21/16, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 49. Record Vote Number: 58.
Amendment SA 3814 proposed by Senator Coats to Amendment SA 3801.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3814 proposed by Senator Coats to Amendment SA 3801.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3814, under the order of 4/21/16, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 49. Record Vote Number: 58.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3814, under the order of 4/21/16, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 49. Record Vote Number: 58.

amends_amendment.purpose: In the nature of a substitute.

purpose: To limit the use of funds made available for the Advanced Technology Vehicles Manufacturing Loan Program.
